abstract.t: There are use cases where the delivery of contents by a CDN on the behalf of another requires the exchange of extra information between these CDNs. This memo proposes a RESTful framework for the exchange of content distribution metadata between an upstream and a downstream CDN. Then it applies this framework to the use cases selected by te CDNi WG [I-D.ietf-cdni-use-cases] to identify relevant operations, objects and information elements of the CDNi metadata interface and to verify that the RESTful approach suits for these operations.
